sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <description>(Incidental) Once per round the character may suffer 2 strain to add additional damage equal to Brawn to one hit of a successful Lightsaber combat check.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>true</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Falling avalanche</name> <number>TAL0001040</number> <passive_or_active>active</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-01-21 22:21:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e0a49be0dbea0c542901de90cf9619a9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-01-21 22:21:56</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
